sentences.en: A transient application should launch to its previous position and configuration.
sentences.cn: 运行暂时应用时,它应该处于上一次的位置和配置状态下.

sentences.en: Because the whole damned thing is what could properly call transient land.
sentences.cn: 整个这片该死的岩礁,可以被称为一块飘忽不定的土地.

sentences.en: Both transient and steady - state thermal stress can be determined by this procedure.
sentences.cn: 瞬态和稳态的热应力均可用这种方法测定.

sentences.en: During the climacteric may be a transient burst of RNA synthesis.
sentences.cn: 在转换时期的RNA合成可能有短暂的骤增.

sentences.en: Her feeling of depression was transient.
sentences.cn: 她的压抑心情一会儿就过去了.

sentences.en: In most cases, pain is transient.
sentences.cn: 大多数情况下，疼痛是短暂的。

sentences.en: It is due to numerical inaccuracy in the transient - temperature determination.
sentences.cn: 这是由于确定瞬时温度的数值不准确.

sentences.en: It represents an example of a heterocycle being formed as transient species.
sentences.cn: 它仍然是在反应中生成过渡状态的杂环的实例.

sentences.en: Still another system is designed to send out transient pulses intermittently.
sentences.cn: 还设计了另一种系统,它能够间歇地发送瞬间脉冲.

sentences.en: Stratification in polar waters normally is weak and transient.
sentences.cn: 极地水域的成层性是微弱而暂时的.

sentences.en: Such single - function applications have a posture of their own, the transient posture.
sentences.cn: 并且不应该表现出独占式的行为,这样单一功能的应用有其自己的暂时姿态.

sentences.en: The prominent transient drowned in beer. That would be a cute death.
sentences.cn: 了不起的流浪汉在啤酒里淹死, 这倒是个怪有趣儿的死法.

sentences.en: These satellite devices usually take a transient posture.
sentences.cn: 这些卫星设备通常都保持暂时姿态.

sentences.en: Transient applications must be simple, clear, and to the point.
sentences.cn: 暂时应用必须简单 、 清晰并且意思明确.

words.tran_cn: 瞬变现象；过往旅客；候鸟

trans.tran_cn: 短暂的，转瞬即逝的，临时的
trans.tran_en: continuing only for a short time

trans.tran_cn: 临时旅客，瞬变现象，候鸟
